title: Exploring Movie Construction and Production
headline: What's so exciting about movies around the world? Learn how a movie is constructed and produced with this free course!
description: This free online movie production course will teach you about the fundamentals of how movies are made and produced. In this film production course, study a wide range of topics in filmmaking process, including theme, genre, narrative structure, story, directing, acting, cinematography, photography, shooting, editing, and sound. Learn about the basic principles of character development, how to create a three-dimensional character, and a lot more!

courseDescription:
Why do we get excited when we think about going to the movies? Do you love a movie but when asked why, you can't explain it? If you have not watched a lot of movies, then this free online movie construction and pre-production information course will give you a solid foundation for a better understanding the movies you watch. You will also learn how to critically analyse movie distribution.

The movie production course begins by exploring the use of themes and genres in movie construction. Next, you will learn about creating narrative structure and characters. Lastly, you will also learn about directing, cinematography, visual effects, stages, locations, editing and sound in movie post-production. These areas are covered in this specific order so you can see the formation of a movie from the theme, or purpose, through to its completion.

This movie production course will be ideal for anyone interested in learning about the fundamental basics of movie framework, construction, and production. So, why wait? Start learning today and by the end of the week, you will have gained valuable skills and knowledge about how to construct and produce movies!
